mapper.sql: ID, SUPPLIER_ID, SUPPLIER_CONDITION_ID, CREATED_AT, OPERATING_TYPE, IS_DELETED, REASON, PROJECT_ID, UPDATED_AT
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXT_RELATE (ID, SUPPLIER_ID, SUPPLIER_CONDITION_ID, CREATED_AT, OPERATING_TYPE, IS_DELETED, REASON, PROJECT_ID, UPDATED_AT ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierConditionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE}, #{operatingType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

ID,
SUPPLIER_ID,

mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXT_RELATE
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_CONDITION_ID = #{supplierConditionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE},
OPERATING_TYPE = #{operatingType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXT_RELATE set SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER_CONDITION_ID = #{supplierConditionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE}, OPERATING_TYPE = #{operatingType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT pe.* FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXT_RELATE pe INNER JOIN T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER ss ON PE.SUPPLIER_ID = ss."ID" Where 1=1
AND pe.SUPPLIER_CONDITION_ID =#{supplierConditionId}
AND pe.OPERATING_TYPE in (${reason})
AND pe.PROJECT_ID =#{projectId} ORDER BY SUPPLIER_CONDITION_ID
AND SS.SUPPLIER_NAME LIKE '%${supplier.supplierName}%'
